ComicInfo.Title: Deadly Pawn!
ComicInfo.Summary: Doctor Strange—an enemy of Ghost Rider? A demonic “Strange” begins a sporadic attack on Johnny Blaze.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:30:49. [CVDB18410]
ComicInfo.Writer: Roger McKenzie, Alan McKenzie, Don Perlin
ComicInfo.Inker: Owen McCarron, Tony DeZuniga, Alfredo Alcala, Frank Giacoia
ComicInfo.Letterer: Peter Iro, Jean Izzo, Gaspar Saladino, Artie Simek, Irving Watanabe
ComicInfo.Characters: Bounty Hunter, Doctor Strange, Dormammu, Ghost Rider (Blaze), Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Wong, Zarathos
